entry.title: cs229_note_1
entry.content:
证明: \[
abla_AtrABA^TC = CAB + C^TAB^T\] \[(A_{m*n}, B_{n*n}, C_{m*m})\] \[ ecause trABA^TC\] \[ = \sum_{i=1}^m(ABA^TC)_{ii} \] \[ = \sum_{i=1}^m\sum_{j=1}^n(AB)_{ij}(A^TC)_{ji} \] \[ = \sum_{i=1}^m\sum_{j=1}^n(\sum_{k=1}^nA_{ik}B_{kj})(\sum_{l=1}^mA^T_{jl}C_{li}) \] \[ = \sum_{i=1}^m\sum_{j=1}^n\sum_{k=1}^n\sum_{l=1}^mA_{ik}B_{kj}A^T_{jl}C_{li} \] \[ = \sum_{i=1}^m\sum_{j=1}^n\sum_{k=1}^n\sum_{l=1}^mA_{ik}A_{lj}B_{kj}C_{li}\] \[	herefore (
abla_AtrABA^TC)_{pq} \] \[=  rac{\partial trABA^TC}{\partial A_{pq}} \] \[=  rac{\partial}{\partial A_{pq}}\sum_{i=1}^m\sum_{j=1}^n\sum_{k=1}^n\sum_{l=1}^mA_{ik}A_{lj}B_{kj}C_{li} \] \[= \sum_{j=1}^n\sum_{l=1}^mA_{lj}B_{qj}C_{lp} + \sum_{i=1}^m\sum_{k=1}^nA_{ik}B_{kq}C_{pi} \] \[= \sum_{j=1}^n\sum_{l=1}^mC^T_{pl}A_{lj}B^T_{jq} + \sum_{i=1}^m\sum_{k=1}^nC_{pi}A_{ik}B_{kq} \] \[=\sum_{j=1}^n(C^TA)_{pj}B^T_{jq} + \sum_{i=1}^mC_{pi}(AB)_{iq}\] \[=(C^TAB^T)_{pq} + (CAB)_{pq}\] \[	herefore 
abla_AtrABA^TC = CAB + C^TAB^T\]
